de.th.wildau.dsc.sne.webserver
Class HttpWriter

java.lang.Object
  de.th.wildau.dsc.sne.webserver.HttpWriter

public class HttpWriter
extends Object

The HttpWriter generate and write the http response (header and body) in the output stream.

Constructor Detail

HttpWriter

protected HttpWriter(OutputStream outputStream,
                     byte[] direct)
This constructor is only for caches. He write the byte array directly. The http Status Code is in this case -1.
